note.p: Birth: Euskirchen, near Bonn, Germany (09 October 1852)
Death Place: Berlin, Germany (14 or 15 July 1919)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1920-1921 vol 98 pp l-lvii, plate, signed by M O F
References: W van der Kloot, 'April 1915: Five Future Nobel Prize-Winners Inaugurate Weapons Of Mass Destruction And The Academic-Industrial-Military Complex' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 149-160
Notes: DSB gives death date as 15 July 1919
